translations: 尊敬；认为（esteem 的过去分词）

sentences.sentence: She was esteemed the perfect novelist.
sentences.translation: 她被认为是最完美的小说家。

sentences.sentence: It is indeed an honour to serve my country in such an esteemed position.
sentences.translation: 在如此受人尊敬的岗位上为我的国家服务实属一种荣誉。

sentences.sentence: He was esteemed by his neighbours.
